name: Optimum Exit Popup
author: Optimum Creative

sections.description: Optimum Exit Popup is a simple and light weight exit popup plugin. Using this plugin, you can show popup with information or a subscription form to your website visitors. This is the most easier and user friendly Exit Popup Plugin released in WordPress plugin directory, so far.
sections.installation:
• Download and install this plugin via wordpress directory,
  • Once installed, navigate to Optimum Popup to enable the popup.
sections.faq: If you have any questions or queries, please ask them here: info@optimumcreative.com
sections.changelog:
V.1.1.2

  • Fixed form styling fields overflowing height & with issues.

V.1.1.1

  • Improved backend UI and resolved PHP warnings.

V.1.1

  • Improved Userinterface and added jQuery enqueue (If not loaded earlier).

V.1.0

  • First stable release

upgrade_notice: Plugin upgrade is safe and secure. However, it is recommended that you must take database backup before upgrading the plugin.
